Description: Ostracon, fragment of the rim and wall of a red-orange pottery bowl, the fabric is partially pink in section, the interior is painted red and the edge of the rim grey-black, the exterior is covered with a red-brown slip and remains of one line of incised Coptic text.
Curator's comments: To be published by J. Cromwell & J. Faiers
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (394244) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/394244)
